entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Razor task ran into copy failure. #29289
  • Avoid packaging patched assemblies that are part of the framework #29280
  • Update repo to use `Newtonsoft.Json` 13.0.2 #29269
  • Enable plugin support in dotnet tool #29268
  • A problem occurs when you customize a template #29265
  • Setting PublishSingleFile in the project can affect output assembly type #29263
  • dotnet tool install does not include all the files in .nupkg #29262

Closed

  • Error, warn, or fix behavior when specifying output path when building a solution #15607
    7.0.2xx
  • Create 7.0 project using terminal and run the project using https, the url can't opened. #29246

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29290
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the correct nuget.config file and remove a bunch of extra sources #29288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet nuget commands show correct help text #29266
    Area-CLI
  • Add tracking of the nuget cache to see how many files we downloaded during the test run. #29264
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix stabilize package version for 7.0.2xx #29281
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [ASP.NET] Remove versions from baselines (#29093) #29119
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [ASP.NET] Remove versions from baselines (#29093) #29120
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the target framework for the desktop test projects #28932
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #29095
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29040
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29039
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29041
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.308 #29285
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.405 #29286
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve build stability by ensuring we aren't double publishing everywhere #29182
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove tmp from the default includes for tests #29180
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29036
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.13
  • Update branding to 7.0.102 #29287
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.113 #29284
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.2xx] inverted language version conditions in console / classlib templates to support new language features for newer language versions #29270
    Area-Common templates
  • Deploy watch to redist #29257
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Watch

Updated

  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Document for breaking changes, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use the portable rid for --use-current-runtime (backports #21748) #27849
    Area-External, Servicing-consider
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2055697 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add base class for all test classes using WatchableApp. #29258
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.3
  • dotnet tool install skip unlisted version #28951
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29158
